ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: barbarian:con/dex bonus
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: in light armor gain double dex bonus to AC. Gain 2 hp per point over 14 in constitution.

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: dexterity: no AC bonus
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: does not get dexterity bonus for armor class

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: dwarf: poison and magic resistance
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: bonus to poison, rod/staff/wand and spell saves. +1 for every 3.5 constitution.

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: fighter: con bonus
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: extra hitpoint bonus for high constitution.

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: infravision
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: can see in the infrared spectrum up to 60ft in the dark.

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: light 20'
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: radiate light in 20' radius

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:feign death
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: feign death; 2 turns per level in duration

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:immune disease/haste/slow
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: immune to all diseases, haste and slow spells

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:immune geas/quest
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: immune to quest and geas spells

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:immune poison
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: immunity to poison

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:mask mind
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: mask mind, resist ESP 70%, +2% per level after 4

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:mind blast resist
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: mindblast and telepathic attacks made as if against 18 intelligence.

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:quivering palm
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: quivering palm can be attempted once per week

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:resist charms
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: resist beguiling, hypnosis, suggestion and charm spells 50%, +5% per level after 9th

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:self heal
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: heal self, 1d4+1 once per day, improved +1 hp cured per level after 7th level

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:speak with animals
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: speak with animals as druids

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: monk:speak with plants
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: speak with plants as druids

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: paladin:turn undead
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: turn undead as cleric 2 levels lower.

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: paladin:warhorse
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: call paladin's warhorse

ExtraAbilitiesClass.name: ranger:magic item use
ExtraAbilitiesClass.description: able to use non-written magic items with effects of clairaudience, clairvoyance, ESP and telepathy.
